TopicTitle: How to change the color of the EVA suit?

Articles.Content:
I was wondering if it was possible to change the color of the EVA suits because I do start to get a bit board of the white EVA suits and it would be nice to have a change.

Psycho529
That would be nice too. I think the Kerbals in orange suits are orange. But, I have yet to EVA one. Would be great if there was an easy way.
I'm sure Squad will make it as easy as with flags in the future.

The classic trio (Bob, Jeb, and Bill) all have orange suits in IVA, but the standard white suit in EVA.

Fun Faqt: I did not start with Jebediah Kerman. The first Kerbal to become a Kerbonaut was now-decorated, now-MIA Ronely Kerman.

EDIT: I found Ronely. He... um... volunteered to return to the KSC test piloting program.

Edited June 21, 2013 by SuperWeegee4000
Well as far as I know there isn't any simple way to get the textures folders, hence the fact I put this up.

I was wondering if it was possible to change the color of the EVA suits because I do start to get a bit board of the white EVA suits and it would be nice to have a change.

Psycho529

I'm getting a bit plank of them too...

I don't know of any way to change space suits.

the universe replacer mod allows you to do this i think.

EDIT: yep here it is http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer-v3-2

Edited August 15, 2013 by duncan1297

Universe replacer, as stated above.

Album: http://imgur.com/a/qrnRA
